title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Mix spaghetti with bacon, then stir in egg-cheese mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions and add tomato puree with spices.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A healthy mix of vegetables sautéed with soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok and sauté garlic.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
